mapper.select: select f_name,f_name_code,f_from_city,f_from_longitude,f_from_latitude,f_to_city,f_to_longitude,f_to_latitude,f_total,f_truck_num,f_ton from freight from freight where f_name = #{name}
select f_name,f_name_code,f_from_city,f_from_longitude,f_from_latitude,f_to_city,f_to_longitude,f_to_latitude,f_total,f_truck_num,f_ton from freight from freight where f_from_city = #{from}
select f_name,f_name_code,f_from_city,f_from_longitude,f_from_latitude,f_to_city,f_to_longitude,f_to_latitude,f_total,f_truck_num,f_ton from freight from freight where f_to_city = #{to}
